hello: I have a question: what if you boot from a USB but you don't have internet access and therefore can't get the driver to get internet?
the only time I ever needed to be able to get online for a driver was for some oddball unsupported wlan adapter, but the NIC still worked. In my case, I plugged in a cable. Kept going.
based on the xubuntu flash drive I carry around, I'd wager yes, it should work on most hardware it meets with little trouble.
